title: Bank of America Calls Synopsys (SNPS) a Lower-Beta AI Play With Catch-Up Potential
description: Synopsys, Inc. (NASDAQ:SNPS) is one of the AI Stocks in the Spotlight for Investors. On December 11, Bank of America upgraded the stock to “Buy” from neutral and raised its price target to $560.00 from $500.00. The bank said that following latest results, shares of Synopsys are attractive at...

title: OpenAI Unveils ‘Skills’ Feature for ChatGPT to Enhance AI Customization
description: OpenAI has quietly introduced "Skills," a modular feature for ChatGPT and Codex CLI, inspired by Anthropic, enabling customizable tasks like data analysis and code generation. This strategic move enhances AI versatility amid competition, addresses workforce skills gaps through certifications, and raises ethical concerns about misuse. It promises to reshape AI interactions and innovation.

title: NEWMEDIA.COM Launches RankOSTM From Stealth, a Proven Platform for AI and Search Visibility
description: NEWMEDIA.COM publicly launches RankOSTM, a proprietary AI visibility platform proven with 100s of brands across AI-powered and traditional search.

title: LG Sinha chairs Kashmir University council meeting, approves new progs in AI, Data Science & Languages
description: Major academic revamp includes 5-year integrated master’s in AI, tourism, Kashmiri Srinagar: Lieutenant Governor Manoj Sinha on Sunday chaired the 84th Meeting of the University Council of the University of Kashmir (KU), at Lok Bhavan, Srinagar.
